org.influxdata.platform

Interface AuthorizationClient


  • public interface AuthorizationClient
    The client of the InfluxData Platform that implement Authorization HTTP API endpoint.
    Author:
    Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (17/09/2018 11:09)

      • updateAuthorization

        @Nonnull
Authorization updateAuthorization(@Nonnull
                                           Authorization authorization)
        Updates the status of the authorization. Useful for setting an authorization to inactive or active.
        Parameters:
        authorization - the authorization with updated status
        Returns:
        updated authorization
